Question: Wellington, when asked who was the greatest general of the day, answered: "In this age, in past ages, in any age, this person.".
Hints: In January 1779, this person was enrolled at a religious school in Autun, mainland France, to learn French.
Following several allied victories, the war concluded after this person's abdication in 1814.
He had been tested by the famed scientist Pierre-Simon Laplace, whom this person later appointed to the Senate.
